alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 2:13PM CDT until July 16 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Montgomery County in east central Missouri... Warren County in east central Missouri... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 213 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jonesburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Warrenton, Wright City, Jonesburg, Truesdale, Innsbrook, Foristell, and High Hill. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 179 and 200. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
